content.question: Which of the following monetary policy actions by the Federal Reserve would result in an appreciation of the United States dollar?

choices.label: An open-market purchase of government bonds
An increase in interest on reserves
A decrease in the discount rate
A decrease in the required reserve ratio
An increase in the money supply

content.answer: An increase in interest on reserves
